committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of May 31, 1962, (76 Stat. 89) which authorized the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain omitted lands along the Snake River in Idaho.

summary.text: Amends the Act of May 31, 1962, to establish May 31, 1967, as the benchmark for the fair market value of specified lands along the Snake River in Idaho which the Secretary of the Interior has been authorized to sell. Sets procedural guidelines for applicants claiming a right of first preference for the purchase of such lands. Precludes reimbursement to anyone for money paid for lands previously acquired under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of May 31, 1962, (76 Stat. 89) which authorized the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain omitted lands along the Snake River in Idaho.
